payload.content: Everything created, including paper, hard drives, and cloud data, has an expiration date.

name: Everything created, including paper, hard drives, and cloud data, has an expirat
content: Everything created, including paper, hard drives, and cloud data, has an expiration date.

payload.content: Christian Bök, an award-winning poet, taught himself genetic engineering to encode information into Deinococcus radiodurans, a bacterium that can survive the vacuum of space, as part of 'The Xenotext' project.

name: Christian Bök, an award-winning poet, taught himself genetic engineering to enco
content: Christian Bök, an award-winning poet, taught himself genetic engineering to encode information into Deinococcus radiodurans, a bacterium that can survive the vacuum of space, as part of 'The Xenotext' project.

payload.content: Radical Autodidacticism is a mindset and practice involving the ambition to charge into uncharted territory, learn what is necessary, and push through obstacles to teach oneself complex topics and skills.

name: Radical Autodidacticism is a mindset and practice involving the ambition to char
content: Radical Autodidacticism is a mindset and practice involving the ambition to charge into uncharted territory, learn what is necessary, and push through obstacles to teach oneself complex topics and skills.

payload.content: To master any skill, one can use 'impossible' learning strategies, including the mindset and practices of Radical Autodidacticism and polymathic persistence.

name: To master any skill, one can use 'impossible' learning strategies, including the
content: To master any skill, one can use 'impossible' learning strategies, including the mindset and practices of Radical Autodidacticism and polymathic persistence.

payload.content: A 'Skill Stack' strategy involves combining two or more skills (e.g., Poetry + Genetics) to become unique.

name: A 'Skill Stack' strategy involves combining two or more skills (e.g., Poetry + G
content: A 'Skill Stack' strategy involves combining two or more skills (e.g., Poetry + Genetics) to become unique.

payload.content: Christian Bök's work with 'The Xenotext' challenges existing knowledge about memory, legacy, and the limits of self-education.

name: Christian Bök's work with 'The Xenotext' challenges existing knowledge about mem
content: Christian Bök's work with 'The Xenotext' challenges existing knowledge about memory, legacy, and the limits of self-education.
